Narrator lived in a small apartment
near the city center
Narrator had just started their first job
as a graphic designer

Narrator received a text from their father
about taking a few steps with his walker
That moment marked the turning point in the father's recovery
regaining most mobility within a year
Several years later
the father can walk unassisted
and enjoys life in his seventies
